bug.title: fb iphone app showing newly created event details in news feed
bug.description:
Steps to reproduce:
A user has an iphone with facebook app installed.
The facebook user has added a facebook application to their facebook profile.
That facebook application publishes an event using the facebook.events.create API.
The user opens facebook on their iphone_ and sees event detail data in their news feed. <- Bug! This behaviour is NOT observed on www.facebook.com. Users should not see all events created by an application in their feed.
